languages.text: {n}Теобальд харкает синеватой кровью — бронепластина на его груди пробита в нескольких местах, а вместо живота — месиво из металла и кишок. Когда белесые глаза {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}навигатора{/g} находят Кассию, он едва слышно хрипит:{/n} "Теперь... это твоя ноша, Дитя... Выживи. Вернись в лоно Дома, как... как того требует твое предназначение..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Теобальд харкает синеватой кровью — бронепластина на его груди пробита в нескольких местах, а вместо живота — месиво из металла и кишок. Когда белесые глаза {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Навигатора{/g} находят Кассию, он едва слышно хрипит:{/n} "Теперь... это твоя ноша, Дитя... Выживи. Вернись в лоно Дома, как... как того требует твое предназначение..."

languages.text: {n}Theobald coughs up bluish blood — the armour plate on his chest is perforated in a few places, and there is a tangle of metal and viscera where his abdomen ought to be. When the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}'s pale eyes find Cassia, he quietly rasps,{/n} "Now... this is your burden, Child... Survive. Return to the fold of your House, as... your destiny demands..."
languages.original_text: {n}Теобальд харкает синеватой кровью — бронепластина на его груди пробита в нескольких местах, а вместо живота — месиво из металла и кишок. Когда белесые глаза {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}навигатора{/g} находят Кассию, он едва слышно хрипит:{/n} "Теперь... это твоя ноша, Дитя... Выживи. Вернись в лоно Дома, как... как того требует твое предназначение..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Theobald coughs up a gob of bluish blood — the armour plate on his chest is perforated in a few places, and there is a tangle of metal and viscera where his abdomen is supposed to be. When the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}'s pale eyes find Cassia, he starts wheezing under his breath:{/n} "Now... this is your burden, Child... Survive. Return to the fold of your House, as... your destiny demands..."

languages.text: {n}Theobald hustet und spuckt bläuliches Blut. Die Rüstungsplatte auf seiner Brust weist mehrere Löcher auf, und dort, wo sich sein Bauch befinden sollte, befindet sich ein Gewirr aus Metall und Eingeweiden. Als die blassen Augen des {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigators{/g} Cassia finden, keucht er leise:{/n} "Nun ... ist das Eure Last, Kind ... Überlebt. Kehrt unter die Fittiche Eures Hauses zurück, wie ... Eure Bestimmung es verlangt ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Theobald coughs up bluish blood — the armour plate on his chest is perforated in a few places, and there is a tangle of metal and viscera where his abdomen ought to be. When the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}'s pale eyes find Cassia, he quietly rasps,{/n} "Now... this is your burden, Child... Survive. Return to the fold of your House, as... your destiny demands..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Theobald hustet und spuckt bläuliches Blut. Die Rüstungsplatte auf seiner Brust weist mehrere Löcher auf, und dort, wo sich sein Bauch befinden sollte, befindet sich ein Gewirr aus Metall und Eingeweiden. Als die blassen Augen des {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigators{/g} Cassia finden, keucht er leise:{/n} "Nun ... ist das Eure Last, Kind ... Überlebt. Kehrt unter die Fittiche Eures Hauses zurück, wie ... Eure Bestimmung es verlangt ..."

languages.text: {n}Théobald crache un sang bleuâtre. Perforée de toute part, sa cuirasse arbore un trou béant au niveau de son abdomen, laissant entrevoir un entremêlement de viscères et de métal. Quand les yeux pâles du {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateur{/g} se posent sur Cassia, il parvient à articuler d'une voix rauque :{/n} « Maintenant... C'est votre fardeau, Enfant... Survivez. Et retournez auprès de votre maison... comme l'exige votre destin... »
languages.original_text: {n}Theobald coughs up bluish blood — the armour plate on his chest is perforated in a few places, and there is a tangle of metal and viscera where his abdomen ought to be. When the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}'s pale eyes find Cassia, he quietly rasps,{/n} "Now... this is your burden, Child... Survive. Return to the fold of your House, as... your destiny demands..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Théobald crache un sang bleuâtre. Perforée de toute part, sa cuirasse arbore un trou béant au niveau de son abdomen, laissant entrevoir un entremêlement de viscères et de métal. Quand les yeux pâles du {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateur{/g} se posent sur Cassia, il parvient à articuler d'une voix rauque :{/n} « Maintenant... C'est votre fardeau, Enfant... Survivez. Et retournez auprès de votre maison... comme l'exige votre destin... »

languages.text: {n}西奥巴德咳了一口蓝色的血。他胸前的盔甲已经被打穿了好几个洞，腹部被打烂了，金属和内脏混在了一起。这位{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}苍白的眼睛看到了卡西娅，以虚弱的声音开了口。{/n}“好了……这是你的职责，圣子……活下去，回到你的家族身边吧……因为……这就是你的命运……”
languages.original_text: {n}Theobald coughs up bluish blood — the armour plate on his chest is perforated in a few places, and there is a tangle of metal and viscera where his abdomen ought to be. When the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}'s pale eyes find Cassia, he quietly rasps,{/n} "Now... this is your burden, Child... Survive. Return to the fold of your House, as... your destiny demands..."

traits.locale_text: {n}西奥巴德咳了一口蓝色的血。他胸前的盔甲已经被打穿了好几个洞，腹部被打烂了，金属和内脏混在了一起。这位{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}苍白的眼睛看到了卡西娅，以虚弱的声音开了口。{/n}“好了……这是你的职责，孩子……活下去，回到你的家族身边吧……因为……这就是你的命运……”

languages.text: {n}シオボールドは青みがかった血を吐き出す。彼の胸部のアーマープレートには数カ所穴があり、腹部があるべき場所には金属と内臓が絡まっていた。{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}の青白い瞳がカシアを見つけると、彼は静かに摩擦音を立てる。{/n}「さて…これがあなたの負うべきものだ、御子よ…生き残るのです。…運命が求めるまま、あなたの家に戻りなさい…」
languages.original_text: {n}Theobald coughs up bluish blood — the armour plate on his chest is perforated in a few places, and there is a tangle of metal and viscera where his abdomen ought to be. When the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}'s pale eyes find Cassia, he quietly rasps,{/n} "Now... this is your burden, Child... Survive. Return to the fold of your House, as... your destiny demands..."

traits.locale_text: {n}セオバルトは青みがかった血を吐き出す。彼の胸部のアーマー板には数カ所穴があり、腹部があるべき場所には金属と内臓が絡まっていた。{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}の青白い瞳がカシアを見つけると、彼は静かに指示した。{/n}「さて…これはあなたの重荷だ、子よ…生き残れ。…あなたの運命が要求するように、あなたの家に戻りなさい…」
{n}シオボールドは青みがかった血を吐き出す。彼の胸部のアーマープレートには数カ所穴があり、腹部があるべき場所には金属と内臓が絡まっていた。{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}の青白い瞳がカシアを見つけると、彼は静かに摩擦音を立てる。{/n}「さて…これがあなたの負うべきものだ、御子よ…生き残るのです。…運命が求めるまま、あなたの家に戻りなさい…」

languages.text: {n}Theobald tose una sangre azulada. La coraza de su pecho está agujereada en varios sitios y una maraña de metal y vísceras ocupa el lugar donde debería tener el abdomen. Cuando la pálida mirada del {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navegante{/g} se posa sobre Cassia, jadea con voz tenue:{/n} «Ahora... esta es tu carga, niña... Sobrevive. Vuelve a tu casa... es tu destino...».
languages.original_text: {n}Theobald coughs up bluish blood — the armour plate on his chest is perforated in a few places, and there is a tangle of metal and viscera where his abdomen ought to be. When the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}'s pale eyes find Cassia, he quietly rasps,{/n} "Now... this is your burden, Child... Survive. Return to the fold of your House, as... your destiny demands..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Theobald tose una sangre azulada. La coraza de su pecho está agujereada en varios sitios y una maraña de metal y vísceras ocupa el lugar donde debería tener el abdomen. Cuando la pálida mirada del {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navegante{/g} se posa sobre Cassia, jadea con voz tenue:{/n} «Ahora... esta es tu carga, niña... Sobrevive. Vuelve a tu casa... es tu destino...».

languages.original_text: {n}Theobald coughs up bluish blood — the armour plate on his chest is perforated in a few places, and there is a tangle of metal and viscera where his abdomen ought to be. When the Navigator's pale eyes find Cassia, he quietly rasps,{/n} "Now... this is your burden, Child... Survive. Return to the fold of your House, as... your destiny demands..."

languages.text: {n}Theobald'ın öksürmesiyle ağzından mavimsi kan dökülüyor. Göğsündeki zırh plakası çeşitli yerlerinden delinmiş durumda ve karnının olması gereken yerde metalden ve iç organlardan oluşan bir düğüm var. {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacı'nın{/g} solgun gözleri Cassia'yı bulduğunda kısık ve hırıltılı sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Bu yük artık senin Çocuk. Hayatta kal. Hane ocağına geri dön. Kaderin... Böyle buyuruyor."
languages.original_text: {n}Theobald coughs up bluish blood — the armour plate on his chest is perforated in a few places, and there is a tangle of metal and viscera where his abdomen ought to be. When the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}'s pale eyes find Cassia, he quietly rasps,{/n} "Now... this is your burden, Child... Survive. Return to the fold of your House, as... your destiny demands..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Theobald'ın öksürmesiyle ağzından mavimsi kan dökülüyor. Göğsündeki zırh plakası çeşitli yerlerinden delinmiş durumda ve karnının olması gereken yerde metalden ve iç organlardan oluşan bir düğüm var. {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacı{/g}'nın solgun gözleri Cassia'yı bulduğunda kısık ve hırıltılı sesle şöyle diyor:{/n} "Bu yük artık senin Çocuk. Hayatta kal. Hane ocağına geri dön. Kaderin... Böyle buyuruyor."
